articles.title: New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
articles.content:
New Year Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Egyptian President
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a message of greeting from Abdel Fattah al-Sisi, president of the Arab Republic of Egypt, on Dec. 30 last year.
					 The president extended his heartfelt greetings to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the New Year 2018.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the friendly Korean people bigger progress and prosperity, hoping that the special relations between the two countries would continue to develop.

articles.title: Electric Power Production on Increase in DPRK
articles.content:
Electric Power Production on Increase in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- In hearty response to the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, electric power producers in different parts of the DPRK have increased production with a will to become honorable pioneer in achieving fresh victory of revolution.
					 The Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex generated over 2 million kWh more electric power than scheduled for the first three days of the New Year.
					
					 The Pukchang Thermal Power Complex boosts the power production everyday by taking good control of air for boilers and raising the operational rate of generators, while considerably reducing heat loss.
					
					 The Wonsan Army-People Power Station in Kangwon Province overfulfilled the New Year's Day plan by 1.7 times and has continued to increase the power production everyday.
					
					 Hydro-power stations like Sodusu, Puryong and Orangchon power stations in North Hamgyong Province have also carried out their daily plan by 1.3 times.

articles.title: Military Attack on DPRK Will Lead U.S. to Destruction: Minju Joson
articles.content:
Military Attack on DPRK Will Lead U.S. to Destruction: Minju Joson
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Minju Joson Saturday in a commentary cites facts to prove that the U.S. is more openly pursuing its scenario to escalate military confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The commentary says:
					
					 War maniac Trump asserted in a recent "report on national security strategy" that all military options are on the table. Against this backdrop, the national security assistant of the White House, the secretary of Defense and other warmongers of the U.S. let out a load of war-inciting remarks every day. They talked such rubbish that the U.S. should make preparations for "forcibly denuclearizing" the DPRK if necessary and the day when the U.S. sets out on the military action will be "doomsday" for the DPRK, underlining the need to get ready for the outbreak of war.
					
					 Terming this confrontation hysteria last-ditch efforts of those who bitterly realized their real flop in the nuclear stand-off with the DPRK which accomplished the great historic cause of completing its state nuclear force, the commentary goes on:
					
					 It is the resolute stand of the DPRK to willingly deal with the U.S. by force if it fails to come to reason and opts for the use of force against the former.
					
					 The world will witness the terrible destruction of the U.S. in the finals of the standoff with the DPRK, which has lasted for decades.
					
					 The war maniacs of the U.S. should never forget that the strong nuclear strike means of the DPRK firmly protecting peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and security of the country and the nation have put the whole U.S. territory in their strike range and the military attack on the DPRK will lead it to destruction.

articles.title: Papers Call for Dynamic Advance under Guidance of WPK
articles.content:
Papers Call for Dynamic Advance under Guidance of WPK
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday editorially call upon the whole party and army and all the people to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country, in hearty response to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 Rodong Sinmun says that in order to glorify 2018 as a year of great victory, all the people should make redoubled efforts and wage a more dynamic campaign with revolutionary optimism.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's guidance serves as the vibrant might of powerful socialist Korea and as the invincible banner of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their vessel forces are now making every desperate effort to break our army and people's steadfast faith in the Party and their firm confidence in victory and optimism, fearing them most.
					
					 In the face of such last-ditch efforts of the enemies, all the party members, servicepersons and people should more vigorously struggle, full of confidence in victory and optimism and thus display the mettle of the heroic Korean people carrying into practice the plan and decision of the Party Central Committee.
					
					 The paper stresses the need for all the people to make a dynamic advance toward the final victory in building a powerful socialist country while displaying the valiant mettle of heroic Korea under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Minju Joson says that this year will be a year of another victory for the Korean people led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK's Strategic Decision Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Strategic Decision Is Just: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article cites facts that last year international laws and fundamental principles of international relations were openly ignored on the international arena and sovereignties of various countries violated owing to the outrageous infringement and intervention by the hegemonic forces.
					 The article says:
					
					 Anyhow, a nuclear war, feared so much by the world people, has not broken out on the Korean peninsula, the hottest spot in the world. This was because nukes of tyranny were contained by nukes of justice.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK got more confident that the road of holding the new line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force advanced by the Party and bolstering up the nuclear deterrence in every way is the most correct one to be followed by them to the end.
					
					 Their will to defend peace on the Korean Peninsula and the region grew stronger.
					
					 The DPRK emerged a world-level nuclear power and rocket power possessed of A-bomb, H-bomb and ICBM.
					
					 The U.S. got hell-bent in nuclear war drills but dared not to provoke the DPRK possessed of powerful war deterrent.
					
					 The two law-governed traditions in which victory belongs to the DPRK but defeat to the U.S. continued last year, a proof that the DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is the most just one and the way of rapidly bolstering the nuclear force chosen by the latter was entirely right.

articles.title: S. Korean Students Call for Detention of Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
S. Korean Students Call for Detention of Lee Myung Bak
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the Students Progressive Alliance in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on January 4 to declare the inauguration of the Students Commando for Getting Traitor Lee Myung Bak Punished, according to a CBS report of south Korea.
					 Recalling the sins committed by Lee in power, speakers at the conference demanded an investigation into the crimes he committed by throwing the people's life into destitution and breaking the ties with the north.
					
					 Branding Lee as kingpin of evils, they said they would hold a rally every week in demand of his detention.

articles.title: S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Declares Fresh Campaign This Year
articles.content:
S. Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Declares Fresh Campaign This Year
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Jaju Sibo, the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting before the grave of Jon Thae Il in Kyonggi Province on Jan. 2 and declared its will to carry on the struggle for realizing the demands of workers this year.
					 At the meeting, the chairman of the confederation newly elected last year made a speech. He said that now is the time for all to join efforts for social solidarity.
					
					 Earlier on January 1 the chairman announced the confederation's action program for this year.
					
					 He said that the confederation would conduct a joint campaign together with the Federation of Trade Unions to have the demands of workers met.
					
					 He stressed that they would wage a vigorous struggle for peace against war, conclusion of DPRK-U.S. peace accord, independent national reunification, probe into the truth about "Sewol" tragedy, repeal of the "agreement" on sexual slavery and halt to the deployment of THAAD.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries from December 11 to 18 last year to commemorate the 6th anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows in Brazil, Singapore, Thailand, Guinea, Nigeria, Senegal, Libya, Tanzania, Algeria and Angola.
					
					 Displayed at their venues were photos showing the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 There were also books and photos introducing the struggle of the Korean army and people.
					
					 Such Korean films as "The Sun of Songun Shedding Its Rays All over the World" and "My Country Has Emerged Victorious by Dint of Single-minded Unity" were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the Committee of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil for Remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il praised the life of Kim Jong Il who devoted his all to the happiness of the people.
					
					 A department director of the Guinean Ministry of Education said it is thanks to the tested leadership of Kim Jong Il that the DPRK could register shining successes despite the worst adversity and that's why the Korean people have missed him very much.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed Abroad
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Nigeria and Benin issued joint statements on Jan. 2 in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					 The National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, the Group for the Study of the Songun Politics and the Group for Self-Reliance Studies in Nigeria said in their joint statement that all the nuclear war drills with foreign forces and any move to introduce U.S. nuclear equipment and aggressor forces should be halted in the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They expressed firm belief that the Korean people would achieve new victories in the struggle for the reunification of the country and the building of a powerful socialist country.
					
					 The Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said that the south Korean authorities should respond to the sincere efforts of the DPRK for detente, instead of getting involved in the U.S. reckless anti-DPRK nuclear war moves to escalate the tension.
					
					 They stressed that the Korean people would smash the moves of the anti-reunification forces at home and abroad by concerted efforts and usher in a new phase for the independent reunification.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution" Rejected in Russia
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Sanctions Resolution" Rejected in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 6 (KCNA) -- Russian bodies issued statements on Dec. 26 and 27 last year to slam the adoption of another "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK.
					 The All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League said in a statement:
					
					 It is more clearly revealed that the UN has turned into a tool speaking for the interests of the U.S. and its stooges.
					
					 We will always stand by the Korean working youths and other people, fully supporting the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK and stop its nuclear threat against the latter.
					
					 The Lenin Young Communist League of the Russian Federation said in a statement:
					
					 The U.S. works hard to deny the fact that the DPRK, though it is not big, can make a counterattack on the American empire.
					
					 It had better learn how to co-exist with the DPRK, and before this, acknowledge the fact that the latter is a nuclear power.
					
					 We reject the "sanctions resolution" aimed at destroying human civilization and stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The Regional Social Organization of Russia "Borozino" said that the UNSC "sanctions resolution" is a criminal document deceiving humankind and blocking the DPRK's development.
					
					 The U.S. should acknowledge the entity of the DPRK and no longer escalate the tensions on the Korean peninsula, it added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente egipcio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion del Presidente egipcio
Pyongyang, 6 de enero (ACNC) -- El Presidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea,  Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 30 de diciembre del ano pasado el Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Egipto, Abdel Fattah al-Sisi.
					Su texto va como sigue:
					
					Tengo el gran placer de extenderle a Su Excelencia mis sinceras felicitaciones en ocasion del Ano Nuevo 2018.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para formular votos por su buena salud y felicidad y por el mayor progreso y prosperidad del amistoso pueblo coreano y reiterar nuestro deseo de que se fortalezcan y se desarrollen de continuo las relaciones especiales entre nuestros dos paises.
					
					Igualmente, deseo que el Ano Nuevo sea el del bienestar, la seguridad y la estabilidad para Vd. y su pueblo y todos los demas del mundo.
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.
